//: This is comment: 'verCode' version code need to be changes with each release, its an integer and should be always greater then previous release version code
This is comment: 'version' version is a user readable string, usually semver notation of the release
This is comment: 'modelId' should be unique across the augle platform, user reverse domain name notation, Example: com.augle.apps
This is comment: 'type' augle app type
